snippet.title: Whizbang's Workshop Cinematic | Hearthstone
snippet.description:
Welcome to Whizbang's Workshop! This expansion is teeming with plushies, Miniatures, and more. Nostalgic mechanics, exciting new toys, and whimsy galore are waiting to be explored March 19th!

Pre-Purchase Whizbang's Workshop Mega Bundle: https://blizz.ly/3StAP9h
Learn more about Whizbang's Workshop: https://blizz.ly/3u4Ns2n
Whizbang's Workshop Card Library: https://blizz.ly/3TZwayb

http://PlayHearthstone.com

Subscribe!
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=PlayHearthstone
